query: SELECT id, userId, fileName, fileUrl, fileKey, fileSize, mimeType, LEFT(content, 100) as contentPreview, status FROM knowledge_bases WHERE mimeType = 'application/pdf' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 20;
